name: Copywriter
description:
We are looking for a literate copywriter in English and Russian for writing articles, landing pages and any other textual content.

Duties:

Writing texts
Translation of the required text material
Rewrite
Finding information on the Internet

Requirements:

Experience in translation and writing is desirable
High level of English (not lower than upper-intermediate)
Competent written speech
Execute orders on time

Conditions:

Salary: 400 $
Office work
Schedule: Monday - Friday, from 10.00 to 19.00
Probationary period: 1 month
